description.baseFactor: This parameter represents the initial estimate of the time it takes to unlock an achievement when no other achievements have been unlocked.
description.scaleFactor: This parameter determines how rapidly the estimated time increases as more achievements are unlocked.
description.finalRampFactor: This parameter is an additional factor that steepens the exponential curve of the estimated time when the number of achievements reaches the finalRampTrigger value.
description.finalRampTrigger: This parameter represents the number of achievements that must be unlocked to trigger the finalRampFactor.
description.more: For further understanding, read the code and run the file 'achievementTimeEstimation.js' from the 'test' folder.
